pitch.cc: Andrew Cashner may prefer to go after Carlos Lee, whose OPS is .650 this season, with the two-seam fastball rather than facing Jeff Keppinger, whose OPS is .732.
Dangerous count for Andrew Cashner; Carlos Lee is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .735 OPS against them this season and .666 against everything else.
